narrative.bioHtml:
Raphael Tobar is a 3D & graphics designer experienced in glTF/GLB pipelines, AR-ready assets, & marketing/advertising. Skilled in

• Photo-manipulation
• Vector designs
• 3D modeling/texturing/rendering
• Understanding of animation & rigging practices
• Video editing & motion graphics
• CAD-to-Quad retopology

Delivered interactive work for adidas and Giphy; served as Lead 3D Artist on the 2021 Webby nominated "2020: The Ride" game.

workHistory.description: An online, browser app where the user creates and moves an avatar in a sandbox/open world to mingle and connect with other users in a suggestive to futuristic themed environment. Authored the world, structures, and miscellaneous sculptures in glTF/GLB format.
Promotional material for Frame-by-Frame book as an interactive site. Created the 3D assets and glTF optimizing for user-interaction. Developed by Fuzzy Wobble & Niles Fromm.
Optimize CAD assets to quad topology, add meta-data for animating features, and deploy glTF and AR furniture content for interactive browser experience. developed by Fuzzy Wobble & Niles Fromm.
Built the levels, optimized provided assets into glTF/GLB, and created animations for their creative "Contact Us 2" e-mail driving game. developed by Fuzzy Wobble & Niles Fromm.

Collaborated for the game "2020: The Ride", showcasing principal 3d assets and some animations for animal figures. Developed in Unreal by Pariah Interactive, a 2021 Webby Awards nominee in the category "Best VR Headset Experience 2021".
